mapper.select: SELECT A.BATCH_RESULT_ID, A.BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, A.BATCH_OPERT_ID, B.BATCH_OPERT_NM, B.BATCH_PROGRM, A.PARAMTR, A.STTUS, C.CODE_NM STTUS_NM, A.ERROR_INFO, A.EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, A.EXECUT_END_TM, DATE_FORMAT(A.LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, A.LAST_UPDUSR_ID, A.FRST_REGISTER_ID, DATE_FORMAT(A.FRST_REGIST_PNTTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS FRST_REGIST_PNTTM FROM COMTNBATCHRESULT A, COMTNBATCHOPERT B, COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE C WHERE A.BATCH_OPERT_ID = B.BATCH_OPERT_ID AND A.STTUS = C.CODE AND C.CODE_ID = 'COM076' AND A.BATCH_RESULT_ID = #{batchResultId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMTNBATCHRESULT ( BATCH_RESULT_ID, BATCH_SCHDUL_ID, BATCH_OPERT_ID, PARAMTR, STTUS, ERROR_INFO, EXECUT_BEGIN_TM, EXECUT_END_TM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM,FRST_REGISTER_ID, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM ) VALUES ( #{batchResultId}, #{batchSchdulId}, #{batchOpertId}, #{paramtr}, #{sttus}, #{errorInfo}, #{executBeginTime}, #{executEndTime}, #{lastUpdusrId}, SYSDATE(), #{frstRegisterId}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.update: UPDATE COMTNBATCHRESULT SET ERROR_INFO = #{errorInfo}, STTUS = #{sttus}, EXECUT_END_TM = #{executEndTime}, LAST_UPDUSR_ID = #{lastUpdusrId}, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM = SYSDATE() WHERE BATCH_RESULT_ID = #{batchResultId}
